author: Wendy Belessis
description: Drink your way to a strong immune system
cleaned_text: Boost Your Immune System Naturally With Ginger — Registered Dietitians And Nutritionists Share Homemade Drink Recipes Drink your way to a strong immune system "Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food." - most often attributed to Hippocrates As the throes of summer die down to welcome the cooler weather as well as the potential spread of colds, coughs, and COVID-19, it's only natural our thoughts turn to boost our immune system. Enter ginger. Since ancient times, ginger has been used medicinally to treat issues ranging from stomach problems to muscle and joint pain. But did you know the lumpy-looking root is an immune-boosting hero? It's [anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3665023/#:~:text=full%20text%20article-,CONCLUSIONS,pain%20after%20intense%20physical%20activity.) help strengthen our immune system. And what better way to get all of ginger's benefits than enjoying it in a delicious drink? A few Registered Dietitians and Nutritionists were generous enough to share the drink recipes they make when looking to boost their immune system. And these immune-boosting recipes have some side benefits as well: - Most ingredients are all-natural. [Eating whole foods](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5837313/)and [avoiding processed foods](https://www.bmj.com/content/365/bmj.l1451)help keep us healthy. - We can make these drinks at home. - Most ingredients are fruits and vegetables which help our bodies fight sickness because they have [natural antiviral and antimicrobial properties](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3650511/). Immune Booster Smoothie "Ginger has been shown to have therapeutic properties, including antioxidant effects and an ability to inhibit the formation of inflammatory compounds, both of which help our immune systems function well," says [Abbie Gellman](https://www.ice.edu/newyork/explore-ice/chefs/abbie-gellman), Registered Dietitian and Chef at the [Institute of Culinary Education](https://www.ice.edu/).
